name: Chat Support Button
author: WordTune

sections.description:
Install the plugin and get support from real people right in your WordPress dashboard and Chat to us with the userlike.com Chat Solution. Please note that a subscription is required.
This Plugin is relying on a 3rd party as a service and shares your information with userlike.com.
You can find the Terms of use and privacy policies her: https://www.userlike.com/de/terms#privacy-policy and her https://www.userlike.com/de/terms

  1. Where’s the JS from?

Userlinke.com

  1. WHEN does it get called?
    Once you have successfully logged into your WordPress dashboard

  2. Our terms of use/privacy are.

https://wordtune.de/datenschutz
https://wordtune.de/agb
sections.faq:
How can i use it?

Activate the plugin and book your Support

A question that someone might have
